unit.utterance: ca zamana durħne, heχ ašːij χabar bursille, [CROSSTALK] hila
unit.utterance_translation: One time, guys, if I tell you the story, of this [person].

unit.utterance: iž dila ucːiq'ar χew, Mammala Q'urban bik'ul, ašːij walχatːa
unit.utterance_translation: I have a cousin called Mamala Kurban, you know him.

unit.utterance: c'ili, rebč'ible dila rucːi, aʁʷc'alla dičible, aʁʷc'allalij gučibičib libilra dila qili
unit.utterance_translation: Well, when my sister died, and we held the forty-day wake [after her death], for forty days all were at my home.

unit.utterance: wallah bik'ʷar... na heltːi masqaralla hel dučːi buq'aˁqij zamana buq'aˁqij χalq'licːella iχtilatlij...
unit.utterance_translation: By God, they say, jokes to make the night pass by, the time pass by, with the folks, by talking.

unit.utterance: dila kajʁib juldaš lewde cːilibk'an
unit.utterance_translation: There was a friend of mine who came down from Cilinki.

unit.utterance: wallah, haʔibda hel cːilibk'annicːe, harikːʷa bursa, haʔibda ul, daq ħaˁkimdex dičːaqun dila ucːiq'arlij
unit.utterance_translation: "By God", I say to this man from Cilibki, "you say it like this", I say. "My cousin loves a lot appointments/positions [to be the boss, etc.].

unit.utterance: heχitːe, pirsidatil šːilla akːʷar; šːilla pirsidatil akːʷar, warkːa ik'ul glawa administracijali rajunna wataʁibilda haʔible bursakːʷa haʔibda ul
unit.utterance_translation: 'There is no head of the village. There is no village head. The head of the district administration send me to find one.'" I said to him, "Say it (like this) (to my cousin)".

unit.utterance: c'ili Ramazan bik'ul cːilibk'an glawa administracijala lewde
unit.utterance_translation: This man from Cilibki was called Ramazan, he was the head of the (village) administration.

unit.utterance: c'ili hel ik'ʷar, dul helicːe haʔibda, helitːe bursa, daˁʡaˁnne, hel čak'al akːʷaril lew
unit.utterance_translation: Then he says,... I told him secretly, "Say (it) like this!", in a place where there was nobody.

unit.utterance: c'ili hatira qːuʁal dalhitːidirčaqad haʔibda heχitːe wataʁibilda haʔible bursa, haʔibda
unit.utterance_translation: Then I also said, "Say that we support him like this, that they sent you here."

unit.utterance: ilil bursib, wallah, heχitːe ik'ʷar, hana činaw urkːanne ik'ʷar, texničeskij obrazovaniela wah, agranum k'ew, ik'ʷar
unit.utterance_translation: And he said it. He says, "By God, now where do we find a person with a technical education."

unit.utterance: c'il zautexnik k'ew ik'ʷar, vetvrač k'ew ik'ʷar tːulka
unit.utterance_translation: "We have a livestock expert, we have a veterinarian," he says.

unit.utterance: hel texničeskij obrazovaniela wah admi nišːala šːilicːew k'ewakːu ik'ʷar.
unit.utterance_translation: "But in our village there is no person (expert) with a technical education", he says.

unit.utterance: hel admi warkːa ik'ul caw ik'ʷar, direktur warq'ij šːilla, pirsidatil warq'ij
unit.utterance_translation: "I was told to find such a person", he says, "and to make him director, head of the kolkhoz".

unit.utterance: c'il hel zamana il dila ucːiq'ar bahla bahlal hajcːurre, zuq'sajk'ul
unit.utterance_translation: At that time my cousin stood slowly up, swinging back and forth.

unit.utterance: na ilijq'ar bikːul caw direktur agaraj
unit.utterance_translation: He wants to become director.

unit.utterance: c'il zuruqsajk'ul, hajcːur, na helka il cajna tːurawerčib, daˁʡaˁnne,
unit.utterance_translation: Then he stood up, puzzled, he secretly led him [Ramazan] [out of the room] once.

unit.utterance: k'ʷijna tːurawerčib il nišːala qilirka, ʡaˁjnalalij tːurawerčib.
unit.utterance_translation: A second time he lead him outside, and a third time.

unit.utterance: [AUDIENCE] Rabazan?
unit.utterance_translation: [AUDIENCE] Ramazan?

unit.utterance: Rabazan.
unit.utterance_translation: Ramazan.

unit.utterance: hana na Rabazan ik'ul caw dicːe, ha hitːirirkulakːu, ce barq'idaja itij dul?
unit.utterance_translation: Now Ramazan says to me, "He does not leave me alone, what should I do with him?

unit.utterance: hana cet'le ce haʔide heticːe dul?
unit.utterance_translation: Now what should I tell him?"

unit.utterance: ul bursa, haʔibda, qːant'le, cajna cara daˁʡaˁnne, Q'urbanni t'am adaq'ijlij, heχitːe
unit.utterance_translation: "You tell him", I said silently like this, such that Kurban did not hear it.

unit.utterance: čːaˁʡaˁl nišːala dirq'ante aʁʷc'allade, aʁʷc'alla guddaturre awaxannenu Wammala Q'urban,
unit.utterance_translation: "Tomorrow the forty-day wake at our place will end, and being there, Wammala Kurban will not come.

unit.utterance: ul, ul bursa qːuʁal hek'icːe, hel Q'urbannicːe, wallah, čːaˁʡaˁllij abizatelna čihajʁij ʡaˁʁunil cab hextːu haʔible
unit.utterance_translation: I told (Ramazan), "You tell Kurban, nicely, that it is necessary that in the morning he must go there, he must be there."

unit.utterance: sːaˁʡaˁt kːaʔallew hextːu, čihajʁij ʡaˁʁunil cab haʔible bursa haʔibda ul
unit.utterance_translation: "It is necessary that he must come, at eight he must be there, tell him this", I said.

unit.utterance: hextːu uq'ij zamana bakːu haʔibda heχila, aaxanne heχ
unit.utterance_translation: I said, "He does not have time to go there, so he will let it be."

unit.utterance: na wisajʁible il kabižib abratna
unit.utterance_translation: Now he went again back [into the room] and they sat down.

unit.utterance: kabižible heltːi, wallah ik'ʷar, heχitːe ik'ʷar, jaʁari ik'ʷar, ce barq'idel aχːuq'al hana ik'ʷar
unit.utterance_translation: They are sitting down, and (Ramazan) says like this, "By God, I do not know what to do now," he says.

unit.utterance: ixtːub čːaˁʡaˁllij sːaˁʡaˁt kːaʔallij wiχʷij ʡaˁʁunil caw hel admi
unit.utterance_translation: "That person must be there (in the administration) at eight o'clock in the morning."

unit.utterance: nu čto že ik'ʷar Q'urban.
unit.utterance_translation: "Well, even if," says Kurban,

unit.utterance: nu, helitːe du wakːʷarxar aʁʷc'alla darq'ij dirχʷanda ušːal, nawerna
unit.utterance_translation: "Well, like this, even with me not being here, you should be able to do the forty-day wake, probably."

unit.utterance: hel zamana Rabazanra, dila ucːira, q'ʷila tːutːula barkat akːʷarce caw,
unit.utterance_translation: And at this time Ramazan, my brother, who is a bit of a chatterbox and lacks patience, says:

unit.utterance: u akːʷar aʁʷc'allara darq'ibda... u akːʷar q'ulhulera dašibda, u akːʷar aʁʷc'allara dirq'anda, uq'aˁn! ik'ʷar
unit.utterance_translation: "Without you we did the forty-day wake [i.e. went to the graveyard], without you we went to the qulhu [at the graveyard], we will also do the forty-day wake without you, so go!"

unit.utterance: c'il... net, ik'ʷar Q'urban, uq'ij abdal iχublekːʷi iž
unit.utterance_translation: Then Kurban says no; he was not such a fool as to go.

unit.utterance: hari, Ramazan, wik'ul caw selsawetlicːe, ca bar t'ašicːaqa hek' ašːala glawa, ca bar, hel aʁʷc'alla darq'ijsat t'ašicːaqa
unit.utterance_translation: (Kurban) says, "Hey Ramazan, ask the village head to wait for one day, make your village head wait for one more day, until we finish the forty-day wake!

unit.utterance: c'il du hextːuw wirχud hek'ila kabinetlew
unit.utterance_translation: And then I will be there in his office."

unit.utterance: hel zamana, na c'ilra uruχ iχuble, it selsawet Ramazan, wallah, ik'ul caw, na ce barq'ide, ik'ul caw, du awaltul iχulle hežil
unit.utterance_translation: Now at this time, the village head Ramazan got afraid, he says "By God, now what should I do," he says, "if he does not leave me?"

unit.utterance: wallah, aaltaχːat wik'ulda du abrat'na, aaltaχːat ik'ulda, bursa, ik'ulda hek'icːe, ja sub cːilibk'an iχʷij ʡaˁʁunil cab, ja xunul
unit.utterance_translation: "By God, if you do not let me, if you do not let me", I say, "Tell him that either the husband or the wife must be from Cilibki, this is necessary.

unit.utterance: hel... carate šːante, carate inženertera meχanekːabera carate šːante k'eb ʡaˁbrabazib hextːubra
unit.utterance_translation: There are other experts in the village, engineers, mechanics, there are many (experts among) the villagers.

unit.utterance: nu tːulka hel čak'a biχʷarra ja sub ja xunul wiχʷij ʡaˁʁunil cab cːilibk'an wiχʷij ʡaˁʁunil cab, šːante razibirχulakːu carat'le
unit.utterance_translation: Whoever it might be (the new village head), either the husband or the wife must be from Cilibki, this is necessary. Otherwise the villagers do not agree."

unit.utterance: c'il helitːe haʔa ik'ulda ul
unit.utterance_translation: I say to him, "Tell him like this!"

unit.utterance: hel zamana ilil hatira qːuʁal daldičaqible,
unit.utterance_translation: At that time he [Ramazan] made his story even more beautiful.

unit.utterance: jaʁari Q'urban, dam asarka c'aχlera cabq'alnu hana u xulčira warq'ible, itːi ištːi haʔible,
unit.utterance_translation: He said, "Hey, Kurban, I am ashamed in front of you, [UNCLEAR]."

unit.utterance: hatira qːuʁal daldičaqible wik'ul cab hel, wallah ja sub wiχʷij ʡaˁʁunil caw, ja xunul
unit.utterance_translation: Telling it more beautifully, he says, "This is it, either the husband must be [from Cilibki], or the wife, by God."

unit.utterance: takoms, ik'ul caw Q'urban, takms, il qːulːuqra aržaqanda
unit.utterance_translation: Kurban says, "(If it is) like this, this problem we will also solve."

unit.utterance: na tembolee, kːamalq'al il uže hana, dila rucːira χaˁbla rarq'ibleda, uže lidil cik'al diχub cad
unit.utterance_translation: All the better that he is already a widower, he buried his wife, my sister. There is nothing there.

unit.utterance: ilil ce birq'ule?
unit.utterance_translation: And what did he do?

unit.utterance: aʁʷc'allara darq'ible, čariχuble, aʁʷc'alla darq'ible xuibil bar agurre cːilibč'i,
unit.utterance_translation: When the forty-day wake was over, he came back. After the forty days was done, on the fifth day he went to Cilibki.

unit.utterance: het Nuʁajskij rajunnice, rarčːible cːilibk'an, xadi karižible, hetra cawra warxle cːilibč'i
unit.utterance_translation: He went to the Nogaj district, found a Cilibki woman, married her, and went directly back to Cilibki together with her.

unit.utterance: nu ixtːuw cara uže pirsidatil warq'ible inkwaˁqible, proklinal ik'ul caw do poslednego!
unit.utterance_translation: Well there they had already elected another one as the head (of the village), and he cursed (all) up to the last one!

unit.utterance: heχ heštːur xunul karižnilara, cawra čariχuble witaguril caw.
unit.utterance_translation: He also married here, and he himself together with her went back from there.

unit.utterance: il mar χabar cab, acːe dul bursulda.
unit.utterance_translation: This is a true story, I tell you.

unit.utterance: [AUDIENCE] xunul ričib car zato
unit.utterance_translation: [AUDIENCE] But for this reason his wife is there.

unit.utterance: xunul ter hanara
unit.utterance_translation: Even now his wife is there.

unit.utterance: [AUDIENCE] hel cːilibk'an rigalu?
unit.utterance_translation: [AUDIENCE] And the Cilibki woman stayed?
unit.add_comments: DF: "rigalu" is an Icari form, in Sanzhi it is "r-el"

unit.utterance: rigal, rigal.
unit.utterance_translation: (She) stayed, (she) stayed.

unit.utterance: amma cabi, kiljanus hel barq'ibil cab mar χabar cab; heštːi šutkala χaburte akːu
unit.utterance_translation: But it is (like this), I swear, this was done [i.e. has happened], it is a true story. This is not a joke.
